name: Ch.11ABaseConvo2
_source: speak;Lute;I've compiled a report on monster sightings in this area.|As our chief intellect, it's my duty to keep us informed.
speak;Lute;Obviously.|Keep your eyes open for unusual movement.|Particularly in the northeastern quadrant.
speak;Lute;Be especially aware of giant arachnids.|Baels have been spotted with increasing frequency.
speak;Lute;Yes, fascinating creatures.|Eight legs, keen armor, venomous fangs...|And the most remarkable fur, though that's besides the point.
speak;Lute;You've touched a Bael's fur?|How unexpected.
speak;Marisa;Killed one last month.|Its coat was like silk.
speak;Lute;Quite right!|The texture is similar to woven silk from the southern markets of Jehanna.|I've researched the material rather extensively, myself.
speak;Marisa;I kept some.|For my sword grip.
speak;Marisa;They move differently than humans.|Their legs have a pattern.|One set of four goes up, then the other.
speak;Lute;You've studied their movement?|I've documented their eight-step locomotion cycle in my bestiary!
speak;Lute;It's the most comprehensive text on magical creatures in existence.|I wrote it myself, obviously.
speak;Marisa;...I'd...|Like to see it.|They are kind of...|Cute...
speak;Lute;They are kind of cute!|In that case, I don't see why not.|From one monster appreciator to another, then!
